INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES($ENV{BOOST_INCLUDEDIR})
FIND_PACKAGE (Boost COMPONENTS system thread regex)

SET(CPPS posix_main_server.cpp)

ADD_EXECUTABLE(echo_server ${CPPS})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(echo_server ${Boost_SYSTEM_LIBRARY})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(echo_server ${Boost_THREAD_LIBRARY})

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(
	echo_server
	
	PROPERTIES
  
	RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${IZENELIB_SOURCE_DIR}/../bin
)
